name: The Verge 2.0
description:
Do you ever want to escape from your mundane, uneventful life?

Wally felt the same way and made a decision to change his life but things got out of control when an uninvited guest entered the game. He must learn to find a true partner and explore the unknown if he ever wants to escape and find his way home.

Enter the world full of dangers, surprises and a ting of betrayal. Play this game as Wally to unravel mysteries and use your instincts to fight and survive.
